caption: Albrecht Dürer (1471–1528; born and died Nuremberg, Germany; active Venice, Italy, and Nuremburg), Three Peasants in Conversation, ca. 1497 – 1498. Engraving on laid off-white paper with part of a watermark: four-petalled flower (Bartsch 86); 10.6 x 7.5 cm (plate). Gift of Dorothy Burr Thompson and Homer A. Thompson (x1991-103)
